segments.text: The kitchen has that homey feel with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly to one side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron is the picture of routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, the overflowing sink is alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, making everything wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, which is kind of heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are mischievously after cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretch looks daring on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girlâ€™s expectant face is sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But with the slippery floor, it's hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden contrasts sharply with the indoor turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it all turns out okay without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me anxious just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
